features: CONNECTS WITH USB-C: The webcam uses USB Type-C to ensure efficient video transfer speeds; Get a fast, reliable connection when you need it most – so you can stream with confidence
SMART AUTO-FOCUS: AI-enabled facial tracking in Logitech Capture delivers accurate focus and exposure; Your content looks professional produced, with crisp, clear results
VERSATILE MOUNTING OPTIONS: Get the perfect angle, every time; Flexible mounting options include tripod compatibility, so you can get the look just right for your stream or video
Logitech capture: This video recording and streaming software makes creating content with streamcam easy, fast and intuitive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Decent quality for beginners and easy to use set up. Just have a good ring lite and it’s totally worth it. Great for a budget option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great streaming camera
reviews.reviewText: This camera works great for streaming. Pixels are great and is super easy to set up. Took maybe 10 minutes from unboxing to mounting. We have 1gig internet and there are never any issues with lag, voice not matching stream, or any other issues. The only complaint with this camera is it does not have a shutter screen. Sounds weird to me as I thought that would be standard. But thankfully it’s in a room by itself and we close the door when not in use. Yes you can put a piece of tape or paper over the screen, but it seems silly to spend $100 and then do that is all. We also bought the white one because it was $40 cheaper than the black version. It’s a little odd on black screens, but nobody sees it and was worth the savings to us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Angry that it is clearly a used product, but an overall great camera.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First, apologies that my video isn't the most amazing. I wanted to show some information on the camera that I couldn't find in current reviews on here, but I am not the best speaker.Day 1 Review (I will only update if something goes wrong):EXTREMELY disappointed to see that the camera is clearly used. If I wanted a used camera, I would have paid a cheaper price for a used one. The box was torn up, and everything inside was pretty dirty. The sticky bit that covered the camera was barely sticky and had dust and dirt completely underneath it. Be wary of the fact that I am very much not the only person who has reviewed this stating they clearly received a used product.The StreamCam itself. Fantastic. I do suggest downloading the Logitech Capture software to get the most out of the cam, although I only had to make very little adjustments. The only light I have directly on me is my monitor, and I feel the cam looks really good with and without a bright desktop. The built in microphone of the cam actually doesn't sound that bad if you needed to use it and I would compare it to some of the "cheaper end" gaming headsets I have bought. Overall, I am very satisfied with the camera itself, but I am absolutely peeved that I was sent used product.To be clear, this does not come with a tripod. This does not come with any sort of privacy cover either. Personally, I bought a stand that I can swivel and move around. In my video review, I have the camera right behind my monitor to give an idea of field of view.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality camera for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the camera because it supports 1920x1080 at 60 fps, something I need for video capture software development and image processing using Direct3D 11. The Amazon page mentions the only video format at 1080p for 60 fps is MJPEG, but it turns out that the camera supports 1080p at 60 fps with NV12 format. The fastest you can get with YUY2 format is 30 fps.Although I am pleased with the camera, I have a complaint about Logitech USB devices. I have a Logitech K850 keyboard and an M720 mouse that use a unifying receiver. I have to plug the receiver in a USB2 port, because if I plug it in a USB3 port, the receiver fails intermittently. I will be typing on the keyboard, but there is no response. The white-button "1" LED blinks as if the keyboard has to re-establish its connection with the receiver. When I additionally plug in the StreamCam (USB-C connection), the failures occur more frequently to the point that I have to unplug the camera in order to type on the keyboard. The same behavior happens if I plug in my Logitech Pro C9 camera, but the failures are less frequent.This behavior is not confined to a Microsoft Windows machine. The same problem occurs on my Ubuntu Linux machine. I keep hoping Logitech can solve this problem and fix it. I like the keyboard, mouse and both cameras, but constant plug/unplug of the camera just to be able to type slows down development.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and easy to connect
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because my work Dell laptop camera seemed fuzzy and had trouble with low light situations like morning and evening meetings, or bright situations when the sun shines directly in at golden hour.This camera is super clear, has great color, and was super simple to install and start using on my Windows/Dell. It was also easy to hook up to my MacBook when I tested it for podcast/Zoom stuff.Mounting arm to hook on the back of the screen works really well too. Note that it sits on but doesn't clamp to the screen.There's an internal mic so be sure to tell your computer or video chat software if you want to use the mic in the camera or on your computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just works right
reviews.reviewText: I bought my first Logitech StreamCam right at the start of the pandemic and it worked PERFECTLY to get our church broadcasts through the tough times with streaming.Post-pandemic it lives on my office Mac and works beautifully. But, for my office PC I had an Elgato FaceCam. That FaceCam constantly locked up and froze when on video calls. I replaced it with a second StreamCam and it works just right, no fuss ever.Also, don't fret over the 1080p image. The image is clear and has good color and exposure. I've seen 4k webcams with worse images. The higher frame rate helps the look as well. I'd take one of these over a cheap 4k camera any day.Can't recommend this camera enough.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es una cámara de stream básica.
reviews.reviewText: No es la mejor opción pero considero que es una buena opción de calidad precio.No es muy cara y la calidad es decente.
Tudo prático, foi só plugar o fio e funcionou sem stress e a qualidade super boa, vale muito a pena, melhor que pagar pra trocar a câmera embutida, que sairia super caro.

reviews.reviewTitle: This camera gives image sharpness and control I have never seen before in a web cam.
reviews.reviewText: I principally use this camera on ZOOM calls, and almost everybody on the other end has remarked at hoe sharp, and bright the image is. The auto focus is extremely good and the lens allows for extreme close ups of objects. It was plug and play on my Windows machine and installed without a hitch. A great value at the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super gute Webcam. Hält was sie verspricht.
reviews.reviewText: Die Webcam liefert in verschiedenen Programmen ein super Bild. Es ist klar und flüssig. Im dunklen Räumen verschlechtert sich die Qualität logischerweise (wie bei jeder anderen Kamera), aber sie liefert trotzdem noch ein gutes Bild, trotz schlechter Bedingung. Durch die Logitech software hat man auch nochmal verschiedene Einstellungsmöglichkeiten.Der Autofokus funktioniert sehr gut. In der Regel fokusiert er einmal und muss danach auch nicht mehr neu fokusieren. Sollte man dann irgendwas anderes als sich selbst in der Kamera zeigen wollen, fokusiert die Kamera, nach meiner Erfahrung, sehr schnell (1 Sekunde). Das funktioniert in der Regel auch sehr gut, sodass die Kamera schnell erkennt, dass was anderes fokusiert werden soll.Die Kamera lässt sich leicht via "Klappklemme" auf dem Monitor befestigen. Dabei hält sie sich unerwartet gut. Zusätzlich kann man diese Klemme auch einfach schließen und sie auf den Tisch oder sonstiges stellen. Man kann die Kamera in alle Richtungen drehen und positionieren.In meinem Fall ist der PC auf der rechten Seite und die Webcam links auf dem Tisch. Für mich persönlich ist das Kabel ein wenig zu kurz. Zusätzlich dürft ihr nicht vergessen, dass die Kamera einen USB-C-Stecker hat und ihr somit entweder einen USB-C Anschluss oder einen bestimmten Adapter benötigt, um diese anzuschließen. Ich habe zufälligerweise einen USB-C-Anschluss und es funktioniert alles einwandfrei. Ich habe die Kamera auch einmal mit einem Adapterkabel an einen herkömlichen USB-Platz angeschlossen. Darüber hat auch alles ganz normal funktioniert.Wer eine Webcam braucht, kann mit dieser wohl nichts falsch machen.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente calidad y muy buen profucto
reviews.reviewText: Recomiendo si quieres comenzar en el mundo del streaming, está cámara es excelente en calidad y precio. Además de que la calidad de la imagen es inmejorable, tiene muy buen foco. Es un 10/10 .
